page.title: 01description of grid 03200690
page.content: The area is almost wholly located within the parish of Auchtertool.Itis extremely hilly with many knolls and valleys.The village of Auchtertool, where half of the population lives, lies on the most direct route between Dunfermline and Kircaldy.Agriculture is the main industry of the area.There are two large dairy farms and four farms practicing mixed farming.The fertile land lies between areas of rough pasture There are two lochs , Camilla, and Gelly.The needs of the area are served by a primary school,a post-office,a general store ,a publc_ house,an hotel and two garages.Most of the people travel to Kirkcaldy for work and entertainment.
